name: polymer-simple-relayer-backend
description: A TypeScript/Bun backend relayer for cross-chain operations

scripts.db:view: sqlite3 -header -column relayer.db "select id, status, source_chain, dest_chain, source_tx_hash, dest_tx_hash, retry_count, mapping_name, (strftime('%s', completed_at) - strftime('%s', created_at)) as 'time_taken_s' from jobs;"
